ing.item: Orange juice; plus 2 teaspoons, fresh or frozen
Fresh ginger; grated, or 1 1/4 tsp ground ginger

directions.step:
In a stainless steel bowl or plastic resealable bag, combine first 6 ingredients. Add the tuna and let marinate for 20 minutes. Broil or grill the tuna 6 inches from the heat source for 4-5 minutes per side. Cook until done as desired (some people prefer their tuna more rare than others do).
Per serving: calories 221, fat 10.7g, 45% calories from fat, cholesterol 43mg, protein 27.3g, carbohydrates 2.4g, fiber 0.2g, sodium 354mg.
Exchanges: 3 Lean Meat Exchange.
The recommended wines are: Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, or Riesling.
